title: Master Yi's ALpha strike should be a skill shot.
body: He now dashes to initiate it, boom now he takes skill, it must be used towards an enemy champion, if it's used as an escape the player is permanently banned.

replies.body: Making his Q a dash would make him OP. Atm he needs an enemy to become untargetable, but if he can just dash whenever to become untargetable then that would just make him broken.

He already takes a ton, just not in low elos, and not in the button mashing sense.

His kit is restricting 1.5 dimensional, and there are more than a million ways to kill him given if you don't simply feed him.
